means: 不替别人考虑地，考虑不周地，轻率地

sentence.Network_en: Nervous illness can stem from being treated inconsiderately in childhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 怯场是因为小时候受到了轻率的对待所致.

sentence.Network_en: Inconsiderately, he asked to be invited for dinner.
sentence.Network_cn: 他轻率地要求人家邀请他去赴宴.

sentence.Network_en: Terri said that she thought the matter was handled inconsiderately and without regard for her feelings.
sentence.Network_cn: 泰瑞说,她认为这件事处理过程完全未经思考,也没有考虑她的感受.

PerfectNetExp.abs: inconsiderate 不顾及别人的inconsiderately 不替别人考虑地inconsistency 矛盾
inconsiderately , he asked to be invited for dinner .他轻率地要求被邀请去赴晚宴。
沪江词库精选inconsiderately是什么意思、英语单词推荐、用法及解释、英音发音音标...inconsiderately英语翻译成中文: ad. 无谋地词形变化:副词:inconsiderately;名词.
inconsiderable 微不足道的, inconsiderately 考虑不周地, inconsiderate 不体谅的

list.abs: a : of course I am talking about you . I've been waiting here an hour , you inconsiderate jerk !我当然是说你！我在这儿等了一个小时了，你这个不顾别人的傻瓜！
passed his life in an inconsiderable village ; their duties were inconsiderable ; had no inconsiderable influence ., 在一个小山村里度过了他的一生 ; 他们的职务是微不足道的 ; 没有任何的影响.
He passed his life in an inconsiderable village ., 他在一个小小村落中度过他的一生.
She ' s very inconsiderate and only cares about herself ., 她非常不体贴而且只关心她自己.
he passed his life in an inconsiderable village ., 他在一个小小村落中度过他的一生.

sentences.sentence: "inconsiderately, he asked to be invited for dinner"
